first_para: Something New is a political party in England founded in October 2014. The party is primarily based on the concept of an open-source manifesto. Something New is a party of the radical centre, combining ideas from the left and right.

full.extract:
Something New is a political party in England founded in October 2014. The party is primarily based on the concept of an open-source manifesto. Something New is a party of the radical centre, combining ideas from the left and right.
The party is standing two candidates at the 2015 general election in Horsham and South West Surrey.
full.title: Something New (political party)
